name: Preferred Bank
description: Preferred Bank is a California-based financial institution that specializes in providing a wide range of banking services to the commercial and individual sectors. Established in 1991, the bank has grown to become one of the leading community banks in Southern California, focusing on serving the needs of businesses and individuals in the region. Preferred Bank offers an array of services, including commercial and residential real estate loans, business lines of credit, and various deposit products such as checking and savings accounts. The bank prides itself on its customer-centric approach, emphasizing personalized service and tailored financial solutions that meet the unique needs of its clients. With a strong commitment to community engagement, Preferred Bank actively participates in local initiatives and supports various charitable organizations. Its strategic focus on the Asian-American community has positioned it as a trusted partner for many businesses and individuals in that demographic. The bank is also committed to maintaining a strong financial position, consistently achieving solid earnings and growth metrics, which reflect its robust risk management practices and operational efficiency. As it looks to the future, Preferred Bank aims to expand its footprint while continuing to enhance its service offerings and deepen its community ties.

seo.meta_title: Preferred Bank | Community Banking Solutions in California
seo.meta_description: Explore Preferred Bank, a leading community bank in California providing tailored banking services for businesses and individuals. Learn more about our commitment to customer service and community support.

faq.question: What services does Preferred Bank offer?
faq.answer: Preferred Bank offers commercial loans, business lines of credit, checking accounts, savings accounts, and more.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Preferred Bank?
faq.answer: W. David Nahai is the CEO of Preferred Bank.

faq.question: Where is Preferred Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Preferred Bank is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.
